casebody.data:
Monday, January 27, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

95-2591. Sharon Village Ltd. v. Licking Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 94-M-1214. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for additional time for oral argument currently scheduled for February 19,1997,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for additional time for oral argument be, and hereby is, granted, and time is extended to twenty minutes per side.
